subject: Baseball
Apologies
lead_paragraph: Yankees closer Mariano Rivera apologized to reporters for a testy exchange with Joba Chamberlain the night before, but said that they “are family here” and that “it happens.”
snippet: Yankees closer Mariano Rivera apologized to reporters for a testy exchange with Joba Chamberlain the night before, but said that they “are family here” and that “it happens.”
